text: La Jagua Airport is an airport serving the town of Garzón, in the Huila Department of Colombia. The airport is southwest of the town, near the village of La Jagua. ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - La Jagua *OurAirports - La Jagua *FallingRain - La Jagua *Google Maps - La Jagua Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Garzón Airport
